subject: Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The most interesting negotiating contest will probably be the one between agent Scott Boras and the Royals over shortstop Mike Moustakas, who was the second player selected.
snippet: The most interesting negotiating contest will probably be the one between agent Scott Boras and the Royals over shortstop Mike Moustakas, who was the second player selected.
